role_description: An Ansible role that installs tree-cli (a CLI tool that lists contents of directories in tree-like format) on nearly any platform
role_description_full_overview: [tree-cli](https://github.com/MrRaindrop/tree-cli) is a recursive directory listing program that produces a depth indented listing of files. With no arguments, tree lists the files in the current directory. When directory arguments are given, tree lists all the files and/or directories found in the given directories each in turn. Upon completion of listing all files/directories found, tree returns the total number of files and/or directories listed.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs tree-cli (a CLI tool that lists contents of directories in tree-like format) on nearly any platform.
